com.android.launcher

Interface DragController

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DragLayer

    public interface DragController
    Interface for initiating a drag within a view or across multiple views.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  DragController.DragListener
      Interface to receive notifications when a drag starts or stops

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int DRAG_ACTION_COPY
      Indicates the drag is a copy.
      static int DRAG_ACTION_MOVE
      Indicates the drag is a move.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void startDrag(android.view.View v, DragSource source, java.lang.Object info, int dragAction)
      Starts a drag

    • Field Detail

      • DRAG_ACTION_MOVE

        static final int DRAG_ACTION_MOVE
        Indicates the drag is a move.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DRAG_ACTION_COPY

        static final int DRAG_ACTION_COPY
        Indicates the drag is a copy.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • startDrag

        void startDrag(android.view.View v,
             DragSource source,
             java.lang.Object info,
             int dragAction)
        Starts a drag
        Parameters:
        v - The view that is being dragged
        source - An object representing where the drag originated
        info - The data associated with the object that is being dragged
        dragAction - The drag action: either DRAG_ACTION_MOVE or DRAG_ACTION_COPY
